com.gotenna.sdk.firmware

Class GTFirmwareUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareUpdater

  • public final class GTFirmwareUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles updating the goTenna's firmware and notifies listeners about firmware update progress, as well as firmware update success/failure.

    Created on 2/19/16

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState
      Indicates the various possible states of the firmware updating process.
      static interface  GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when firmware updating processes change.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GTFirmwareUpdater(GTFirmwareVersion currentFirmwareVersion, com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareFileDownloadInfo firmwareFileDownloadInfo, GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
      Creates a GTFirmwareUpdater to help with the firmware updating process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Performs cleanup and aborts the firmware update.

      Determines the current firmware update state.
      SystemInfoResponseData getSuccessfulSystemInfo()

      Set the current firmware update listener callback.
      void startFirmwareUpdate()
      Starts a firmware update from the beginning, given that we are currently in the inactive state, and have all the required data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GTFirmwareUpdater

        public GTFirmwareUpdater(@NonNull
                         GTFirmwareVersion currentFirmwareVersion,
                         @NonNull
                         com.gotenna.sdk.firmware.GTFirmwareFileDownloadInfo firmwareFileDownloadInfo,
                         @Nullable
                         GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
                  throws GTFirmwareFileDataException,
                         GTFirmwareNrfException
        Creates a GTFirmwareUpdater to help with the firmware updating process.
        Parameters:
        currentFirmwareVersion - The current firmware version of device to upgrade.
        firmwareFileDownloadInfo - Info related to what firmware version was just downloaded.
        firmwareUpdaterListener - A listener to receive callbacks about the firmware update process.
        Throws:
        GTFirmwareFileDataException - when newFirmwareFileData has invalid data
        GTFirmwareNrfException - when attempting to update non-NRF firmware to NRF firmware directly

    • Method Detail

      • setFirmwareUpdaterListener

        public void setFirmwareUpdaterListener(@Nullable
                                       GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener firmwareUpdaterListener)
        Set the current firmware update listener callback.
        Parameters:
        firmwareUpdaterListener - The new listener.

      • startFirmwareUpdate

        public void startFirmwareUpdate()
        Starts a firmware update from the beginning, given that we are currently in the inactive state, and have all the required data.

      • stopFirmwareUpdate

        public void stopFirmwareUpdate()

      • getSuccessfulSystemInfo

        @Nullable
public SystemInfoResponseData getSuccessfulSystemInfo()

      • getFirmwareUpdateState

        @NonNull
public GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState getFirmwareUpdateState()
        Determines the current firmware update state.
        Returns:
        The current firmware update state.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Performs cleanup and aborts the firmware update. No notifications will be delivered after this call.
